TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AddressFamily extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定 類別的執行個體 (Instance) 可以使用的位址配置。

span.span: Specifies the addressing scheme that an instance of the class can use.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成員可讓您指定的定址配置用來解析位址。An member specifies the addressing scheme that a will use to resolve an address. 例如，網路表示預期的 IP 第 4 版位址時連接至端點。For example, InterNetwork indicates that an IP version 4 address is expected when a connects to an endpoint. ## Examples 下列範例會建立使用 InterNetwork 。The following example creates a using the InterNetwork . [!code-cpp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Send_Recieve#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Send_Recieve/VB/source.vb#1)]
